Text: Ooh Katey Sagal stops by!?  She's such a cougar :D  Thanks for the up as always! +1

Thanks Wush!
Any chance of getting "Back Office Radio" posted here as well?
Hmm...  I'm starting to think that Wush has not uploaded today's show due to the hurricane :(

Sorry guys I'm dealing with hurricane Sandy. There is massive power outages and 20,000,000 people lost power. I will not be able to get the show up for now. This is the first time this has happened in 3 years since I started so you can tell how bad this storm is. There is massive damage as well. Hopefully I get my power back tomorrow but I could be with out it for a week for all I know. I will keep you all posted.
Yeah I'm watching at all the damage the hurricane has done so far...  Shit is crazy man!  Stay safe Wush!!!!
Good Luck wush. Thanx again for all your work and I hope all your friends and family are safe

Still no power.  I have 4G LTE and have my phone tethered to all my devices and my car provides power to charge them, so I can access the internet but with no outlet power I can't produce the WDM releases.  All the equipment and the server that streams and records the shows is down.

I am hoping that power will return shortly but I have no clue when it will.  Thanks for your patience.
According to WDM's twitter feed, power has been restored and they are working on getting this weeks shows uploaded.  Just thought I'd let you all know :D
According to WDM's twitter feed, power has been restored and they are working on getting this weeks shows uploaded.  Just thought I'd let you all know!!!
